messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
...Our boss is going to do something
huge at the summit.But here I am dealing with some pesky
intruder.You’re spoiling the atmosphere.
You can lose quickly, right?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You’re not supposed to work me
over like that.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
All my excitement’s gone now...This whole Mt. Coronet trip is too
rough, long, and draining...
